name: Better 9gag
description:
Wider, eye-friendy & no ads.
- Wider content (900px).
- Dark background.
- Remove ads, feature bar & side dock.
additional_info:
Version 1.1
- Bigger thumbnail image on vote page.
- Post control bar moved to default position with semi transparent style.
- Recommended Post at right screen, show on hover.
- Fixed twitter button height issue in opera.

Version 1.2
- Fixed recommended post bar.
- Remove download iPhone app.
- Wider image in post page & vote page.
- Fixed post title issue in vote page.
- Moved feedback button to left.

discussions.name: advertisement (nvm refreshed and it's fine, I'm dumb)
